title: Track Awesome Nlg Updates Daily
_seo_title: Track Awesome Nlg (accelerated-text/awesome-nlg) Updates Daily - Track Awesome List
description: A curated list of resources dedicated to Natural Language Generation (NLG)

items.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on Mar 12, 2023
items.content_text:
### Neural Natural Language Generation

*   [lightnlg (⭐3)](https://github.com/kasnerz/lightnlg) - A minimalistic codebase for finetuning and interacting with NLG models using PyTorch Lightning.
items.content_html:
Neural Natural Language Generation

  • lightnlg (⭐3) - A minimalistic codebase for finetuning and interacting with NLG models using PyTorch Lightning.

items.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on Jan 18, 2023
items.content_text:
### Libraries

*   [Writebot](https://docs.writebot.app) - A NodeJS library that makes it easier to use GPT-3 by using presets.
items.content_html:
Libraries

  • Writebot - A NodeJS library that makes it easier to use GPT-3 by using presets.

items.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on Apr 16, 2021
items.content_text:
### Datasets

*   [WikiBio - wikipedia biography dataset](https://rlebret.github.io/wikipedia-biography-dataset/) - This dataset gathers 728,321 biographies from wikipedia. It aims at evaluating text generation algorithms.
items.content_html:
Datasets

items.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on Feb 03, 2021
items.content_text:
### Evaluation

*   [GEM](https://gem-benchmark.com/) - a benchmark environment for NLG with a focus on its Evaluation, both through human annotations and automated Metrics.
items.content_html:
Evaluation

items.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on Nov 23, 2020
items.content_text:
### Neural Natural Language Generation

*   [PaperRobot: Incremental Draft Generation of Scientific Ideas (⭐479)](https://github.com/EagleW/PaperRobot) - We present a PaperRobot who performs as an automatic research assistant.
*   [Question Generation using hugstransformers (⭐1.1k)](https://github.com/patil-suraj/question_generation) - Question generation is the task of automatically generating questions from a text paragraph.
items.content_html:
Neural Natural Language Generation

  • PaperRobot: Incremental Draft Generation of Scientific Ideas (⭐479) - We present a PaperRobot who performs as an automatic research assistant.
  • Question Generation using hugstransformers (⭐1.1k) - Question generation is the task of automatically generating questions from a text paragraph.

items.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on Jun 16, 2020
items.content_text:
### Papers and Articles

*   [2020: How to generate text: using different decoding methods for language generation with Transformers](https://huggingface.co/blog/how-to-generate)
*   [2020: Natural language generation: The commercial state ofthe art in 2020](https://www.cambridge.org/core/services/aop-cambridge-core/content/view/BA2417D73AF29F8073FF5B611CDEB97F/S135132492000025Xa.pdf/natural_language_generation_the_commercial_state_of_the_art_in_2020.pdf)
*   [2020: Turing-NLG: A 17-billion-parameter language model by Microsoft](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/research/blog/turing-nlg-a-17-billion-parameter-language-model-by-microsoft/)
*   [2019: A Closer Look at Recent Results of Verb Selection for Data-to-Text NLG](https://www.inlg2019.com/assets/papers/178_Paper.pdf)
*   [2019: A Personalized Data-to-Text Support Tool for Cancer Patients](https://www.inlg2019.com/assets/papers/28_Paper.pdf)
*   [2019: Controlling Contents in Data-to-Document Generation with Human-Designed Topic Labels](https://www.inlg2019.com/assets/papers/79_Paper.pdf)
*   [2019: Generated Texts Must Be Accurate!](https://ehudreiter.com/2019/09/26/generated-texts-must-be-accurate/)
*   [2019: Hotel Scribe: Generating High Variation Hotel Descriptions](https://www.inlg2019.com/assets/papers/44_Paper.pdf)
*   [2019: Revisiting Challenges in Data-to-Text Generation with Fact Grounding](https://www.inlg2019.com/assets/papers/32_Paper.pdf)
*   [2017: Survey of the State of the Art in NaturalLanguage Generation: Core tasks, applicationsand evaluation](https://arxiv.org/pdf/1703.09902.pdf)
*   [2016: Natural Language Generation enhances human decision-making with uncertain information](https://arxiv.org/pdf/1606.03254.pdf)
items.content_html:
Papers and Articles

  • 2020: How to generate text: using different decoding methods for language generation with Transformers
  • 2020: Natural language generation: The commercial state ofthe art in 2020
  • 2020: Turing-NLG: A 17-billion-parameter language model by Microsoft
  • 2019: A Closer Look at Recent Results of Verb Selection for Data-to-Text NLG
  • 2019: A Personalized Data-to-Text Support Tool for Cancer Patients
  • 2019: Controlling Contents in Data-to-Document Generation with Human-Designed Topic Labels
  • 2019: Generated Texts Must Be Accurate!
  • 2019: Hotel Scribe: Generating High Variation Hotel Descriptions
  • 2019: Revisiting Challenges in Data-to-Text Generation with Fact Grounding
  • 2017: Survey of the State of the Art in NaturalLanguage Generation: Core tasks, applicationsand evaluation
  • 2016: Natural Language Generation enhances human decision-making with uncertain information

items.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on May 26, 2020
items.content_text:
### Neural Natural Language Generation

*   [This Word Does Not Exist (⭐1k)](https://github.com/turtlesoupy/this-word-does-not-exist) - This is a project allows people to train a variant of GPT-2 that makes up words, definitions and examples from scratch.
items.content_html:
Neural Natural Language Generation

  • This Word Does Not Exist (⭐1k) - This is a project allows people to train a variant of GPT-2 that makes up words, definitions and examples from scratch.

items.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on May 21, 2020
items.content_text:
### Neural Natural Language Generation

*   [aitextgen (⭐1.8k)](https://github.com/minimaxir/aitextgen) - A robust Python tool for text-based AI training and generation using GPT-2.
items.content_html:
Neural Natural Language Generation

  • aitextgen (⭐1.8k) - A robust Python tool for text-based AI training and generation using GPT-2.

items.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on May 16, 2020
items.content_text:
### Datasets

*   [The Schema-Guided Dialogue Dataset (⭐575)](https://github.com/google-research-datasets/dstc8-schema-guided-dialogue) - The Schema-Guided Dialogue (SGD) dataset consists of over 20k annotated multi-domain, task-oriented conversations between a human and a virtual assistant.
items.content_html:
Datasets

  • The Schema-Guided Dialogue Dataset (⭐575) - The Schema-Guided Dialogue (SGD) dataset consists of over 20k annotated multi-domain, task-oriented conversations between a human and a virtual assistant.

items.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on Apr 26, 2020
items.content_text:
### Libraries

*   [Number Words (⭐199)](https://github.com/tokenmill/numberwords) - Convert a number to an approximated text expression: from '0.23' to 'less than a quarter'.
items.content_html:
Libraries

  • Number Words (⭐199) - Convert a number to an approximated text expression: from '0.23' to 'less than a quarter'.

items.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on Apr 09, 2020
items.content_text:
### Products

*   [RosaeNLG](https://rosaenlg.org) - An open-source library for node.js or client side (browser) execution, based on the Pug template engine, to generate texts in English, French, German and Italian.
items.content_html:
Products

  • RosaeNLG - An open-source library for node.js or client side (browser) execution, based on the Pug template engine, to generate texts in English, French, German and Italian.

items.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on Jan 17, 2020
items.content_text:
### Dialog

*   [Plato (⭐983)](https://github.com/uber-research/plato-research-dialogue-system) - This is the Plato Research Dialogue System, a flexible platform for developing conversational AI agents.
*   [RNNLG (⭐490)](https://github.com/shawnwun/RNNLG) - RNNLG is an open source benchmark toolkit for Natural Language Generation (NLG) in spoken dialogue system application domains.
items.content_html:
Dialog

  • Plato (⭐983) - This is the Plato Research Dialogue System, a flexible platform for developing conversational AI agents.
  • RNNLG (⭐490) - RNNLG is an open source benchmark toolkit for Natural Language Generation (NLG) in spoken dialogue system application domains.

items.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on Jan 11, 2020
items.content_text:
### Datasets

*   [Alex Context NLG Dataset (⭐22)](https://github.com/UFAL-DSG/alex_context_nlg_dataset) - A dataset for NLG in dialogue systems in the public transport information domain.
*   [Box-score data (⭐113)](https://github.com/harvardnlp/boxscore-data/) - This dataset consists of (human-written) NBA basketball game summaries aligned with their corresponding box- and line-scores.
*   [WeatherGov](https://cs.stanford.edu/~pliang/data/weather-data.zip) - Computer-generated weather forecasts from weather.gov (US public forecast), along with corresponding weather data.
*   [WebNLG (⭐69)](https://github.com/ThiagoCF05/webnlg) - The enriched version of the WebNLG - a resource for evaluating common NLG tasks, including Discourse Ordering, Lexicalization and Referring Expression Generation.
*   [The Wikipedia company corpus](https://gricad-gitlab.univ-grenoble-alpes.fr/getalp/wikipediacompanycorpus) - Company descriptions collected from Wikipedia. The dataset contains semantic representations, short, and long descriptions for 51K companies in English.
items.content_html:
Datasets

  • Alex Context NLG Dataset (⭐22) - A dataset for NLG in dialogue systems in the public transport information domain.
  • Box-score data (⭐113) - This dataset consists of (human-written) NBA basketball game summaries aligned with their corresponding box- and line-scores.
  • WeatherGov - Computer-generated weather forecasts from weather.gov (US public forecast), along with corresponding weather data.
  • WebNLG (⭐69) - The enriched version of the WebNLG - a resource for evaluating common NLG tasks, including Discourse Ordering, Lexicalization and Referring Expression Generation.
  • The Wikipedia company corpus - Company descriptions collected from Wikipedia. The dataset contains semantic representations, short, and long descriptions for 51K companies in English.

items.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on Jan 06, 2020
items.content_text:
### Neural Natural Language Generation

*   [Texar (⭐2.4k)](https://github.com/asyml/texar) - Texar is a toolkit aiming to support a broad set of machine learning, especially natural language processing and text generation tasks.
items.content_html:
Neural Natural Language Generation

  • Texar (⭐2.4k) - Texar is a toolkit aiming to support a broad set of machine learning, especially natural language processing and text generation tasks.

items.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on Jan 02, 2020
items.content_text:
### Datasets

*   [Neural-Wikipedian (⭐10)](https://github.com/pvougiou/Neural-Wikipedian) - The repository contains the code along with the required corpora that were used in order to build a system that "learns" how to generate English biographies for Semantic Web triples.

### Videos

*   [Data-To-Text: Generating Textual Summaries of Complex Data - Ehud Reiter](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kFRw-wk5YOA)
items.content_html:
Datasets

  • Neural-Wikipedian (⭐10) - The repository contains the code along with the required corpora that were used in order to build a system that "learns" how to generate English biographies for Semantic Web triples.

Videos

  • Data-To-Text: Generating Textual Summaries of Complex Data - Ehud Reiter

items.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on Dec 10, 2019
items.content_text:
### Neural Natural Language Generation

*   [PPLM (⭐1.1k)](https://github.com/uber-research/PPLM) - Plug and Play Language Model implementation. Allows to steer topic and attributes of GPT-2 models.
items.content_html:
Neural Natural Language Generation

  • PPLM (⭐1.1k) - Plug and Play Language Model implementation. Allows to steer topic and attributes of GPT-2 models.

items.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on Dec 07, 2019
items.content_text:
### Dialog

*   [Chatito (⭐883)](https://github.com/rodrigopivi/Chatito) - Generate datasets for AI chatbots, NLP tasks, named entity recognition or text classification models using a simple DSL!

### Neural Natural Language Generation

*   [textgenrnn (⭐4.9k)](https://github.com/minimaxir/textgenrnn) - Easily train your own text-generating neural network of any size and complexity on any text dataset with a few lines of code.

### Videos

*   [Natural Language Generation (Introduction)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4fjM72lbJaw)
*   [Strata Data Conference | The future of natural language generation: 2017-2027](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ls7elVbN8bI)
*   [The Quest for Automated Story Generation - Mark Riedl](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wgcDUX_BPpk)
items.content_html:
Dialog

  • Chatito (⭐883) - Generate datasets for AI chatbots, NLP tasks, named entity recognition or text classification models using a simple DSL!

Neural Natural Language Generation

  • textgenrnn (⭐4.9k) - Easily train your own text-generating neural network of any size and complexity on any text dataset with a few lines of code.

Videos

  • Natural Language Generation (Introduction)
  • Strata Data Conference | The future of natural language generation: 2017-2027
  • The Quest for Automated Story Generation - Mark Riedl

items.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on Nov 25, 2019
items.content_text:
### Libraries

*   [Cron Expression Descriptor (⭐1.1k)](https://github.com/bradymholt/cron-expression-descriptor) - A .NET library that converts cron expressions into human readable descriptions.
items.content_html:
Libraries

  • Cron Expression Descriptor (⭐1.1k) - A .NET library that converts cron expressions into human readable descriptions.

items.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on Nov 23, 2019
items.content_text:
### Realizers

*   [Genl (⭐21)](https://github.com/kowey/GenI) - Surface realiser (part of a Natural Language Generation system) using Tree Adjoining Grammar.
*   [JSrealB (⭐25)](https://github.com/rali-udem/JSrealB) - A JavaScript bilingual text realizer for web development.
items.content_html:
Realizers

  • Genl (⭐21) - Surface realiser (part of a Natural Language Generation system) using Tree Adjoining Grammar.
  • JSrealB (⭐25) - A JavaScript bilingual text realizer for web development.

items.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on Nov 12, 2019
items.content_text:
### Neural Natural Language Generation

*   [graph-2-text (⭐151)](https://github.com/diegma/graph-2-text) - Graph to sequence implemented in Pytorch combining Graph convolutional networks and opennmt-py.
*   [Transformers (⭐147k)](https://github.com/huggingface/transformers) - State-of-the-art Natural Language Processing for TensorFlow 2.0 and PyTorch.
items.content_html:
Neural Natural Language Generation

  • graph-2-text (⭐151) - Graph to sequence implemented in Pytorch combining Graph convolutional networks and opennmt-py.
  • Transformers (⭐147k) - State-of-the-art Natural Language Processing for TensorFlow 2.0 and PyTorch.

items.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on Nov 04, 2019
items.content_text:
### Datasets

*   [E2E](http://www.macs.hw.ac.uk/InteractionLab/E2E) - This shared task focuses on recent end-to-end (E2E), data-driven NLG methods, which jointly learn sentence planning and surface realisation from non-aligned data.
*   [YelpNLG](https://nlds.soe.ucsc.edu/yelpnlg) - YelpNLG provides resources for natural language generation of restaurant reviews.

### Evaluation

*   [NLG-eval (⭐1.4k)](https://github.com/Maluuba/nlg-eval) - Evaluation code for various unsupervised automated metrics for Natural Language Generation.
*   [VizSeq (⭐445)](https://github.com/facebookresearch/vizseq) - A Visual Analysis Toolkit for Text Generation Tasks.

### Grammar

*   [GrammaticalFramework](http://www.grammaticalframework.org/) - A programming language for multilingual grammar applications.
*   [CCGweb (⭐5)](https://github.com/texttheater/ccgweb) - A Web platform for parsing and annotation.

### Narrative Generation

*   [Tracery (⭐2.2k)](https://github.com/galaxykate/tracery) - A story-grammar generation library for JavaScript.

### Neural Natural Language Generation

*   [Image Caption Generator (⭐146)](https://github.com/neural-nuts/image-caption-generator) - A Neural Network based generative model for captioning images using Tensorflow.
*   [Summary Generation From Structured Data (⭐188)](https://github.com/akanimax/natural-language-summary-generation-from-structured-data) - For converting information present in the form of structured data into natural language text.

### Products

*   [Accelerated Text (⭐805)](https://github.com/tokenmill/accelerated-text) - Automatically generate multiple natural language descriptions of your data varying in wording and structure.
*   [Twine](http://twinery.org/) - An open-source tool for telling interactive, nonlinear stories.

### Realizers

*   [SimpleNLG-EnFr (⭐25)](https://github.com/rali-udem/SimpleNLG-EnFr) - SimpleNLG-EnFr 1.1 is a bilingual English/French adaption of SimpleNLG v4.2.

### Templating Languages

*   [calyx (⭐63)](https://github.com/maetl/calyx) - A Ruby library for generating text with recursive template grammars.
*   [nalgene (⭐56)](https://github.com/spro/nalgene) - Natural language generation language.
*   [StringTemplate](https://www.stringtemplate.org/) - Java template engine (with ports for C##, Objective-C, JavaScript, Scala) for generating source code, web pages, emails, or any other formatted text output.
items.content_html:
Datasets

  • E2E - This shared task focuses on recent end-to-end (E2E), data-driven NLG methods, which jointly learn sentence planning and surface realisation from non-aligned data.
  • YelpNLG - YelpNLG provides resources for natural language generation of restaurant reviews.

Evaluation

  • NLG-eval (⭐1.4k) - Evaluation code for various unsupervised automated metrics for Natural Language Generation.
  • VizSeq (⭐445) - A Visual Analysis Toolkit for Text Generation Tasks.

Grammar

  • GrammaticalFramework - A programming language for multilingual grammar applications.
  • CCGweb (⭐5) - A Web platform for parsing and annotation.

Narrative Generation

  • Tracery (⭐2.2k) - A story-grammar generation library for JavaScript.

Neural Natural Language Generation

  • Image Caption Generator (⭐146) - A Neural Network based generative model for captioning images using Tensorflow.
  • Summary Generation From Structured Data (⭐188) - For converting information present in the form of structured data into natural language text.

Products

  • Accelerated Text (⭐805) - Automatically generate multiple natural language descriptions of your data varying in wording and structure.
  • Twine - An open-source tool for telling interactive, nonlinear stories.

Realizers

  • SimpleNLG-EnFr (⭐25) - SimpleNLG-EnFr 1.1 is a bilingual English/French adaption of SimpleNLG v4.2.

Templating Languages

  • calyx (⭐63) - A Ruby library for generating text with recursive template grammars.
  • nalgene (⭐56) - Natural language generation language.
  • StringTemplate - Java template engine (with ports for C##, Objective-C, JavaScript, Scala) for generating source code, web pages, emails, or any other formatted text output.

items.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on Nov 03, 2019
items.content_text:
### Grammar

*   [CCG Lab (⭐28)](https://github.com/bozsahin/ccglab) - All combinators, common grammar format, parsing to logical form, parameter estimation for probabilistic CCG.

### Narrative Generation

*   [Random Story Generator (⭐63)](https://github.com/aherriot/story-generator) - Using Natural Language Generation (NLG) to create a random short story.
items.content_html:
Grammar

  • CCG Lab (⭐28) - All combinators, common grammar format, parsing to logical form, parameter estimation for probabilistic CCG.

Narrative Generation

  • Random Story Generator (⭐63) - Using Natural Language Generation (NLG) to create a random short story.

items.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on Oct 29, 2019
items.content_text:
### Grammar

*   [OpenCCG (⭐211)](https://github.com/OpenCCG/openccg) - OpenCCG library for parsing and realization with CCG.
*   [EasyCCG (⭐59)](https://github.com/mikelewis0/easyccg) - CCG: All combinators, common grammar format, parsing to logical form, parameter estimation for probabilistic CCG.

### Realizers

*   [SimpleNLG (⭐818)](https://github.com/simplenlg/simplenlg) - Java API for Natural Language Generation.
*   [SimpleNLG DE (⭐18)](https://github.com/sebischair/SimpleNLG-DE) - German version of SimpleNLG 4.
items.content_html:
Grammar

  • OpenCCG (⭐211) - OpenCCG library for parsing and realization with CCG.
  • EasyCCG (⭐59) - CCG: All combinators, common grammar format, parsing to logical form, parameter estimation for probabilistic CCG.

Realizers

  • SimpleNLG (⭐818) - Java API for Natural Language Generation.
  • SimpleNLG DE (⭐18) - German version of SimpleNLG 4.

items.title: Awesome Nlg Updates on Oct 22, 2019
items.content_text:
### Dialog

*   [NNDIAL (⭐348)](https://github.com/shawnwun/NNDIAL) - NNDial is an open source toolkit for building end-to-end trainable task-oriented dialogue models.
*   [TGen (⭐206)](https://github.com/UFAL-DSG/tgen) - Statistical NLG for spoken dialogue systems.
items.content_html:
Dialog

  • NNDIAL (⭐348) - NNDial is an open source toolkit for building end-to-end trainable task-oriented dialogue models.
  • TGen (⭐206) - Statistical NLG for spoken dialogue systems.
